block.p: WHYTE-Donald. A memorial service celebrating the life of Donald Whyte will be held in the auditorium of the New York Society of Ethical Culture, 2 West 64th St, Friday, Sept. 22, 2000 at 5 PM. Contributions can be made in the memory of Donald Whyte to Music Assistance Fund, c/o American Symphony Orchestra League, 33 W. 60th St, 5th Floor, NY, NY 10023 or A Gift Of Life For Heart Transplant Program, P.O. Box 49, Madison Square Station, NYC 10159.
